== VNC2SWF ==

Home page: http://www.unixuser.org/~euske/vnc2swf/

Like VNCREC, vnc2swf records remote or local VNC sessions. vnc2swf records the session and encodes it to flash video. 

Tips: The python version of vnc2swf - pyvnc2swf has a set of neat utilities, one of which converts the flash video to other formats.
